actions.text: On agreeing to the Barletta amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Barletta to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Barletta to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Barletta amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment requires all legacy tank cars retrofitted for continued Class 3 Flammable Liquid service to include enhanced top fittings protections for pressure relief valves.
purpose: An amendment numbered 28 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to require all legacy tank cars retrofit for continued Class 3 Flammable Liquid service to include enhanced top fittings protections for pressure relief valves.
